lead_paragraph: Linc Energy of Australia said Monday that it was in negotiations that were "very well advanced" with Adani Enterprises, the Indian commodity trader, to sell certain of its coal assets in the province of Queensland.
snippet: Linc Energy of Australia said Monday that it was in negotiations that are "very well advanced" with Adani Enterprises, the Indian commodity trader, to sell certain of its coal assets in the province of Queensland.

headline.main: Linc Energy Confirms Talks With Adani for Coal Seam

abstract: Linc Energy of Australia said Monday that it was in negotiations that are "very well advanced" with Adani Enterprises, the Indian commodity trader, to sell certain of its coal assets in the province of Queensland.
